titleStmt.title: The apostate Protestant a letter to a friend, occasioned by the late reprinting of a Jesuites book about succession to the crown of England, pretended to have been written by R. Doleman.
titleStmt.author: Pelling, Edward, d. 1718.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Davis and J. Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes ascribed to Sir Roger L'Estrange.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
